text: @BorisJohnson Covid-19 in New Zealand caused by people in the UK you couldn't write the book. People told stay at home. People allowed to fly and the most successful country through all of this gets more infections from the UK. You are a laughing stock you will not survive the vote. #ResignNow

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
